General.Name: Manydev Studio SE
General.Description: ManyDev Studio SE engages in the gaming business in Poland. It also offers contract and other support services for game developers. The company was formerly known as Platynowe Inwestycje S.A. and changed its name to ManyDev Studio SE in February 2021. ManyDev Studio SE was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
